content.question: Like other Baroque era still-life paintings, Rachel Ruyschâ€™s Fruit and Insects is composed of

choices.label: gestural brushstrokes that are used to create thick impasto
fine brushstrokes that create a smooth, detailed surface
strong black lines that are used to outline important shapes
twisting forms that are painted with delicate pastel colors

content.answer: fine brushstrokes that create a smooth, detailed surface

unit.text: 3: Early Europe and Colonial Americas, 200 - 1750 CE

topic.text: 3.1: Cultural Contexts of Early European and Colonial American Art

skill.text: Skill 1.B: Describe visual elements of a work of art (or group of related works of art), including-  a. form.  b. style.  c. materials.  d. technique.  e. content.
